title: Learn TypeScript
body: Start with basic types, interfaces, and classes to build a solid foundation.

title: Build a REST API
body: Use Express.js with TypeScript to create a simple CRUD API for todos.

title: express
body: Understand collections, documents, indexing, and aggregation pipelines.

title: Explore React with TypeScript
body: Set up a React project using TypeScript and build reusable components.
